value:
$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|No... Who in their right mind would
attend such a thing?!$k$p$nMPID_比翼アスク|You needn't say such things, Embla.
The festivities can't start without you!$k$p$nMPID_エンブラ|That is none of my concern.
I refuse—and I meant it!$k$p$WmMPID_年明アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_NewYear23,Face|New Year's greetings to you both! In
light of this joyful celebration, I hope
to— Er...is something wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_年明エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_NewYear23,Face|Lady Embla! What is happening here?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アスク,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|As we're dressed for the occasion,
I thought we might participate in the
traditional events together.$k$p$WmMPID_年明アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_NewYear23,Face|What a kind and generous proposal!
I would be honored to join you—if,
that is, it's not too much bother...$k$p$WmMPID_年明エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_NewYear23,Face|I-I'll go too! I will not be left behind!$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|And who said we would be going?!$k$p$nMPID_比翼アスク|Embla, you needn't be disagreeable.
It's a celebration, after all.$k$pBesides, Elm wishes to come along.$k$p$nMPID_エンブラ|Curses... Elm, you—$k$p$WmMPID_年明エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_NewYear23,Face|N-no! I do not WANT to go! I only
said that, if everyone is going, I will
not stay behind...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アスク,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|Then it's decided! Come now,
everyone, let us partake of the
New Year's traditions!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_年明アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_NewYear23,Face|Lord Askr, might I ask...what is the
traditional celebration we're hoping
to observe, and where will we do so?$k$p$WmMPID_年明エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_NewYear23,Face|You were so excited to join without
knowing even the smallest detail?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アスク,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|As with this clothing, the traditional
celebrations here originate in another
world, from a land called Hoshido.$k$pPart of the traditional celebration
involves visiting the deity that resides
at the local shrine.$k$pWe go to state our resolutions for the
new year and ask the deity to watch
over us.$k$p$nMPID_エンブラ|Why would a god need to visit a deity
from another world?$k$pYou go along with this tradition
without question, Askr...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アスク|What is there to question? Just as we
are gods here, there are other gods in
other worlds. It is that simple.$k$p$nMPID_エンブラ|You walk blindly into the traditions of
others without care or consideration.
We are truly incompatible...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_年明アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_NewYear23,Face|It seems that we will be unable
to continue along the path in
this direction...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アスク,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|That is unfortunate... We will just
have to take a detour, then!$k$p$Sbs150|
